/usr/bin/c++    -g -O3 -std=c++11     CMakeFiles/kfusion-main-cpp.dir/src/mainQt.cpp.o CMakeFiles/kfusion-main-cpp.dir/src/PowerMonitor.cpp.o CMakeFiles/kfusion-main-cpp.dir/src/reader.cpp.o  -o kfusion-main-cpp -rdynamic libkfusion-cpp.a -lglut -lXmu -lXi -lGLU -lGL -lSM -lICE -lX11 -lXext -lrt -lstdc++ -lpthread -lGL
